document.full_text: cairo is ready to re-establish diplomatic ties with tehran after a break of more than 30 years, egypt's foreign minister said on monday, signaling a shift in iran policy since the fall of president hosni mubarak.
document.title: egypt ready to re-establish iran diplomatic ties
lines_and_colors: cairo is ready to re-establish diplomatic ties with tehran after a break of more than 30 years, egypt's foreign minister said on monday, signaling a shift in iran policy since the fall of president hosni mubarak.
